title: Ticket #3449: condor_q with -addr flag still connects to collector
description:
running: condor_q -addr "<sinful>"

connects to the collector and insists on finding a schedd with that address. if you are using this to connect to a schedd not in your current pool, you must also specify "-pool other.pool". also, if it can't connect to the collector for some reason, it fails.

given that we already have the address, i don't see why this is necessary. it should just connnect directly to the supplied sinful string.
creator: zmiller
